de.fhbielefeld.ifm.logic

Class WebserviceInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fhbielefeld.ifm.logic.WebserviceInterface

  • public class WebserviceInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the connection to the webservice
    Author:
    Dimitri Mantler

    • Method Detail

      • addMedalToRace

        public boolean addMedalToRace(long raceId,
                     long medalId)
        This method adds a selected medal to a specific monthrace
        Parameters:
        raceId - the MonthRace where the medal will be donated
        medalId - the donated medal
        Returns:
        true if success else false

      • answerFriendRequest

        public boolean answerFriendRequest(long friendId,
                          boolean answer)
        This method send an answer for a friendrequest
        Parameters:
        friendId - the player who send the request
        answer - true=accept false=deny
        Returns:
        true if success else false

      • getAccess

        public long getAccess(java.lang.String email,
             java.lang.String pass)
        This method requests a valid sessionID from the webservice
        Parameters:
        email - the users email
        pass - the users password
        Returns:
        >0 = success -1=failure

      • getAvailableRaces

        public java.util.ArrayList<MonthRace> getAvailableRaces()
        This method requests the available races for the user
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing the available MonthRace-objects

      • getFriendRequests

        public java.util.ArrayList<OtherPlayer> getFriendRequests()
        This method requests the friendrequests for the player
        Returns:
        an ArrayList with OtherPlayer-objects

      • getLog

        public LogbookEntry getLog(long logId)
        This method requests a LogbookEntry-object from the webservice
        Parameters:
        logId - the Id of the requested LogbookEntry-object
        Returns:
        the requested LogbookEntry-object or null if failure

      • getLogs

        public java.util.ArrayList<LogbookEntry> getLogs(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Long> ids)
        This method requests LogbookEntry
        Parameters:
        ids - contains all the requested logIds and the own sessionID at last
        Returns:
        the requested log or null if failure

      • getMedals

        public java.util.ArrayList<Medal> getMedals(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Long> ids)
        This method requests an ArrayList containing the medals with the send ids
        Parameters:
        ids - ids of the requested Medal-objects
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing the requested medals

      • getMyData

        public Player getMyData(long tan)
        This method requests a player-object corresponding to the sessionID from the webservice
        Parameters:
        tan - a valid sessionID or <0 to load the ID from the Playerobject
        Returns:
        the Playerobject or null if failure

      • getPlayerList

        public java.util.ArrayList<OtherPlayer> getPlayerList(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Long> ids)
        This method requests an ArrayList containing OtherPlayer, which participate in a Monthrace
        Parameters:
        ids - the participants for a Monthrace
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing the players or null if failure

      • getRanking

        public java.util.ArrayList<OtherPlayer> getRanking(long from,
                                          long to)
        This method requests the ranking between the parameters included
        Parameters:
        from - should be lower than the other param
        to - should be greater than the other param
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing the OtherPlayer-objects for the requested ranks

      • leaveRace

        public boolean leaveRace(long raceId)
        This method sends a request to the webservice to remove the player from a MonthRace with the given id
        Parameters:
        raceId - the id of the MonthRace to leave from
        Returns:
        true if success, else false

      • readStream

        private java.lang.String readStream(java.io.InputStream i)
        This method assemble the read data from the InputStream into a usable String
        Parameters:
        i - the used inputstream
        Returns:
        the server-response

      • removeFriend

        public boolean removeFriend(long friendId)
        This method removes a friend from the friendlist. The own id will also be removed from the other players friendlist
        Parameters:
        friendId - the friend which should be removed
        Returns:
        true if success, else false

      • reportMedal

        public boolean reportMedal(long medalId,
                  int reason)
        This method report a medal for a given reason
        Parameters:
        medalId - the reported medal
        reason - 0=the medal contains error 1=spam 2=inappropriate content
        Returns:
        true if success else false

      • searchFriend

        public java.util.ArrayList<OtherPlayer> searchFriend(java.lang.String searchString)
        This method requests players which match the searchstring with their names
        Parameters:
        searchString - the search string
        Returns:
        ArrayList with results

      • sendFriendRequest

        public boolean sendFriendRequest(long friendId)
        This method sends a friendrequest to a certain player
        Parameters:
        friendId - the id of the targeted player
        Returns:
        true if success, else false

      • sendLogAnonymous

        public boolean sendLogAnonymous(LogbookEntry log)
        This method sends a LogbookEntry anonymously
        Parameters:
        log - the LogbookEntry which will be send
        Returns:
        true if success else false

      • showErrorDialog

        private void showErrorDialog(java.lang.String method)
        This method displays an AlertDialog with an errormessage and a single button for confirmation
        Parameters:
        method - the name of the method which created the error

      • signUpRace

        public boolean signUpRace(long raceId)
        This method sends a request to the webservice to sign up the player to a MonthRace with the given id
        Parameters:
        raceId - the id of the MonthRace to sign up to
        Returns:
        true if success, else false

      • syncAllLogs

        public boolean syncAllLogs()
        This method syncs all LogbookEntry-objects which are not yet synchronized
        Returns:
        true if success else false

      • syncLog

        public long syncLog(LogbookEntry log)
        This method synchronize a single LogbookEntry-object with the webservice
        Parameters:
        log - The LogbookEntry-object to synchronize
        Returns:
        if the LogbookEntry-object wasn't synchronized before, the new id, else the id of the LogbookEntry-object
